title: KAV is the latest company 3D printing bicycle helmets for a custom fit
content:
The days of the “bathrobe approach” to helmet fitting may be numbered. What’s that? That’s what KAV refers to the idea of purchasing one of a few sizes of bicycle helmets, and then cinching it down to fit your head. Instead, they claim to offer a better fit – through 3D printing, of course. Like […]

The post KAV is the latest company 3D printing bicycle helmets for a custom fit appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
